name: Vector Storm: Power-Up
description:
A top down roguelike arcade shooter where the only one capable of damaging you is yourself and your enemies only make you stronger. Get Stronger, Get Richer, Get Confident, Get Destroyed.

Currently still in development but I want to get it out now for feedback. I'm working on adding a lot of cool new features and content so stay tuned.

Controls described in "How To Play" but also available here: 

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Aim and Shoot

Q: Use Clear

Esc: Back to menu
